comments.body: This still isn't teardown safe against failure, but I think that can wait until we use a higher level function as a context manager, maybe `NamedTemporaryFile`.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +79,83 @@    @pytest.mark.skipif(Path is None, reason="No pathlib.Path")
    def test_path(self):
        tmpname = mktemp('', 'mmap', dir=self.tempdir)
        fp = memmap(Path(tmpname), dtype=self.dtype, mode='w+',
                       shape=self.shape)
